arts.ttl: All square: Villa draw another blank in stalemate with Everton
arts.sum: Everton and Aston VIlla play out a goalless draw in Saturday's Premier League contest at Hill Dickinson Stadium.

arts.ttl: Emiliano Martínez denies Everton and Grealish to secure a point for Aston Villa
arts.athr: Sam Dalling at Hill Dickinson Stadium
arts.sum: Is it a crisis? Probably not. But Aston Villa’s season has, putting it mildly, not started well. Their quest to become the 162nd and final of the teams in England’s top seven divisions to score in 2025/26 fell flat in a goalless draw at Everton. More worryingly for Unai Emery is that his team largely look devoid of ideas, lacking the zip and intensity, that has brought them their recent relative success. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Villa’s goal drought drags on in stalemate with Everton
arts.sum: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Everton’s Premier League clash with Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa’s search for a win continues with goalless draw at Everton
arts.sum: Two points from four matches without scoring kept Villa above only midlands neighbours Wolves in the table

arts.ttl: Martinez the hero as Villa hold Everton to 0-0 draw
arts.sum: Villa’s barren run extended to 4 matches thanks to Martinez’s heroics denying Grealish and Keane. Debuts for Rohl and Elliott changed little as Everton missed out on the summit.

arts.ttl: Troy Deeney slaughters one ‘terrible’ Aston Villa star after what he saw vs Everton

arts.ttl: Aston Villa team news as Unai Emery makes FOUR changes v Everton
arts.sum: Aston Villa have named their starting eleven and substitutes for their Premier League fixture against Everton. Villa boss Unai Emery has made four changes to the starting eleven at Everton this afternoon including surprise starts for Lamare Bogarde in midfield and Emi Buendía behind striker Ollie Watkins. Emery’s players are desperate to kickstart their 2025/26 [...] The post Aston Villa team news as Unai Emery makes FOUR changes v Everton appeared first on AVillaFan.com – Aston Villa Fan Site.

arts.ttl: Everton vs Aston Villa: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 4, 2025
arts.sum: Only four players in the Premier League have scored more goals than the eight of Beto since Moyes arrived at the club. Jack Grealish is likely to start against the club where he first made his name in the game.
